item.title: educational background
item.description: I gained my Bachelor degree in June, 2020 at Shanghai University of Finance and Economics. After that, I applied for and was luckily offered a place at the Global Master in Finance program which is jointly developed by London Business School and Fudan University. Shanghai University of Finance and Economics Major: Accounting GPA: 3.8/4.0 (top5%) Main courses: Strategic Business Reporting, Advanced Corporate Finance, Intermediate Macro-economics, Intermediate Micro-economics Awards: Shanghai Distinguished Graduate Award, Peopleâ€™s Scholarship Certificate: ACCA (11/13 passed)
